1. 
```{r}

?flights

data(flights,package="nycflights13")

LongDelay = subset(flights, flights$arr_delay >= 200)
LongDelay


HoustonFlights = subset(flights, flights$dest == "IAH" | flights$dest == "HOU")
HoustonFlights


SummerDepart = subset(flights, flights$month == 7 | flights$month == 8 | flights$month == 9)
SummerDepart


LongDelay2 = subset(flights, flights$dep_delay <= 0 & flights$arr_delay >= 200)
LongDelay2


QuickFlight = subset(flights, flights$dep_delay >= 100 & flights$arr_delay < -30)
QuickFlight

```
